data.name: The Steps of Divynia
data.detailed_description: Fight beasts and uncover magic as you make your way through the land of Divynia as half of it transforms from the mundane to the unknown. Carve out your destiny as Aldyia in an epic Fantasy tale about courage and holding onto your beliefs. Explore forests, dungeons, and engage with creatures beyond the realm as you struggle to find an answer to Magic’s greatest question. Are some things worth not knowing or does the past deserve to be remembered? Find out in this Storybook-style 2D Adventure.

Carve out your destiny as Aldyia in a tale about courage and holding onto your beliefs. Can you uncover magic's greatest question? Find out in this epic Storybook 2D Adventure.
